title: Butter mutton with puri
description: James Martin's luxurious slow-cooked curry will show you a whole new side to mutton, an economical and oft-overlooked ingredient.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 2oz mutton leg, bone removed, meat cut into 2.5cm/1in cubes
3cm/1¼in piece fresh root ginger, peeled, finely grated
2.5cm/1in piece fresh root ginger, peeled, finely grated
300g/10½oz wholewheat flour, plus extra for dusting
